title: Janhvi Kapoor is golden royalty as she celebrates Diwali with family and friends
text:
Janhvi is making her Netflix debut with Ghost Stories (Picture: Getty/Janhvi Kapoor)

Bollywood actress Janhvi Kapoor shimmered in gold as she celebrated the Hindu festival of lights Diwali.

The 22-year-old dolled up in a glamorous Indo-Western lehenga (the skirt) and choli (the top) for the celebrations and we are envious of how elegant she looks.

Posing with the rest of her family, the star shared some snaps and captioned it: ‘It’s a famjam. Happy Diwali!!’

The first snap had everyone posing for the camera while the second photo saw the entire family lose it to a joke.

Her top was covered in red, blue, green and yellow sequins that would make Thanos himself jealous.

Diwali is celebrated every autumn in the northern hemisphere and is one of the most popular festivals in Hinduism.

It symbolises the ‘victory of light over darkness, good over evil and knowledge over ignorance’.

CaThe entire family looked glamorous (Picture: Janhvi Kapoor)

Meanwhile, Janhvi will be making her Netflix debut in the anthology horror film Ghost Stories set to be released in 2020.

We can’t wait to see the horrors that director Karan Johar bring to our screens.

Janhvi, who is the daughter of the late Sridevi, paid tribute to her famous mother back in February, one year after her passing.

The Dhadat actress shared a childhood picture of her mum’s hands holding hers alongside a touching message to mark the anniversary of Bollywood star Sridevi’s death.

Janhvi wrote: ‘My heart will always be heavy. But I’ll always be smiling because it has you in it.’

The black and white picture was posted to Instagram on Saturday 24 February, exactly one year after she died, aged 54.
